commit message:
Added an id to the 'focus remover'[1] to prevent this message from
PhoneWindow: 'couldn't save which view has focus because the focused
view android.widget.LinearLayout@40529598 has no id.'
[1] see commit 808cef3b7fa8beeb707dfe4b571d6ca422724951
Display a more useful warning in case of direct access.
Layout : Added a required orientation to the 'focus_remover' element.
Log HTTP response code. May be useful.
Removed obsolete variable, as there's nothing to log in the Activity.

Simplified code using IntentService instead of Service.
=> version 1.0.1
